function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proliferation of iot and sensors in healthcare institutes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of robots and drones in high-risk environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic divide affecting housing options and access to home delivery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cutting corners in affordable/social housing developments","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in bathroom and lavatory facilities in existing building stock","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socio-economic divide exposed by covid-19 related design concepts","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Rear extensions do not allow for a ready installation of a containment space without sacrificing room functionality or garden space.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conversion of a front room into a containment space places the containment space in the heart of the sleeping quarters.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Recent homes with double garages at the front may require the owner to forgo a car parking space in order to insert a containment room module.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of living spaces may increase the risk of disease propagation due to close proximity of individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historic buildings with limited modification possibilities may hinder the implementation of modern disease prevention measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rear property extensions and lack of space for containment areas may limit the implementation of quarantine measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced carrying capacity of elevators due to social distancing requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for retrofitting existing building stock to pandemic-proof residential housing","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emphasis on stairs as the main mode of inter-storey communication creating public health benefit","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Internal layout design impacting movement patterns and proximity of people","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Narrow corridors and bottleneck positioning of doors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation in corridor spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High density housing and communal spaces can lead to a concentration of residents and increased flow of people, which can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial separation and narrow corridors can create bottlenefs and bottlenecks that increase the likelihood of close contact and the spread of pathogens between individuals passing through the area.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared access points and common bottlenecks in apartment buildings make them vulnerable to becoming hotspots for contagious diseases, leading to rapid transmission among residents.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate ventilation in housing design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sound dampening in interior spaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shared central air-conditioning without individual filtration zones","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to open air spaces leading to confinement-related mental health issues in isolated occupants.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines in communal spaces, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to pathogens carried by visitors, including asymptomatic individuals with covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of living spaces due to external clothing and footwear being brought indoors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hand hygiene facilities and access to wet cells bathrooms in proximity to the living space","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Permeable zone between exterior and interior in residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus deposits on items and clothing from external spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of universal design in residential structures for whole-of-life-stage use","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate containment space and functionality in residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to minimize the likelihood of virus transmission through structural, physical, and practical means","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dispersal of coronaviruses on surfaces in built environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Facilitated dispersal of sars-cov-2 in office environments and public transport systems with restricted airflow","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus survival on surfaces for prolonged periods","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flare ups of covid-19 continuing to plague humanity for several years","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emergence of other zoonotic coronaviruses as a threat to humans","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through aerosols and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with social distancing and hygiene measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adherence to lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to vaccination and herd immunity efforts","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread and global reach of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in air cargo volume and shipping disruptions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to incorporate epidemiological considerations in building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of rethinking human movement patterns in commuter spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resistance to change from the wider public","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public engagement in discussing and embracing the required adjustment in house design","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
